john Wills Staff ReporterApril  

April  is Earth Day a holiday celebrated around the world to commemorate clean energy use and natural resources conservation amidst concerns of global climate change PERIOD Eastern is one institution striving to accomplish its clean energy goal PERIOD

The holiday was created in  by a group of activists including Wisconsin Senator Gaylord Nelson and was designed to fight the increasingly rapid deterioration of planet Earths resources after the January  oil spill in Santa Barbara California PERIOD

As a public university in Illinois Eastern has prided itself in the past on its ability to contribute to the clean energy discussion PERIOD Easterns Renewable Energy Center was completed in  as a landmark to Easterns commitment to providing clean energy for its students PERIOD

Easterns power is not primarily provided from this center however PERIOD A majority of Easterns campus is powered by electricity generated from natural gas generated offsite PERIOD

Josh Reinhart Easterns public relations coordinator said that EIU purchases its electricity through a group operation that includes several other public universities including ISU WIU SIUE and SIUC PERIOD The ability for all the universities to go to bat together means lower prices and fewer expenditures for the campuses PERIOD

Electric services company Ameren provides the university transport for natural gas and electricity PERIOD This is the source for almost all power that runs through Easterns academic and residential buildings PERIOD

This is a progression from the power source Eastern used prior to  coal PERIOD The transition was made to move away from the pollutants associated with coal power generation PERIOD

Eastern has made significant advancements on other conservational fronts however PERIOD Easterns Facilities office has been diligent in changing out several parts of Easterns infrastructure to ensure that the university uses the least amount of resources possible while running the University PERIOD

Items like LED lighting conversions water conservation window replacements steam production and chilled water production and distribution were included in those projects Reinhart said PERIOD The campus currently maintains the efficiencies gained through those various projects allowing the University to benefit from associated reductions in utility costs. these reduced costs Reinhart mentioned do have a positive effect on the Universitys plans for the future according to a source who asked to remain anonymous PERIOD

The source said that reducing the energy costs on campus has allowed the University to consider possible expansion of clean energy efforts in the future though no official plans have been made as of yet PERIOD

The source also said that there are talks about incorporating new technology inside the upcoming science building which is slated to house the biochemistry chemistry and biological sciences departments PERIOD The building will assuming all goes to plan have expanded access to both solar and geothermal technologies PERIOD

While Easterns conservation and clean energy initiatives are a work in progress the natural elements around campus have earned recognition for the university in the past PERIOD Eastern is a fourtime winner of

the Arbor Day Foundations Tree Campus Higher Education recognition award an accolade to commemorate Easterns dedication to plant life on campus PERIOD

The Tree Campus Higher Education program honors colleges and universities for effective campus forest management and for engaging staff and students in conservation goals according to a press release on Easterns website PERIOD
